languages.text: "На то была воля Великого, шерин!" {n}Джай вскидывает руки и склоняет голову.{/n} "И Великий же ниспослал мне озарение о том, как мановением руки и парой мудрых слов можно скрасить наше томительное ожидание".

traits.locale_text: "На то была воля Великого, шерин!" {n}Джай вскидывает руки и склоняет голову.{/n} "И Великий же ниспослал мне озарение о том, как мановением руки и парой мудрых слов можно скрасить наше томительное ожидание".

languages.text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."
languages.original_text: "На то была воля Великого, шерин!" {n}Джай вскидывает руки и склоняет голову.{/n} "И Великий же ниспослал мне озарение о том, как мановением руки и парой мудрых слов можно скрасить наше томительное ожидание".

traits.locale_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

"And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

"And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

"And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

languages.text: “而这是至高无上的神皇的意愿，亲爱的！”{n}婕伊举起双手，低下了头。{/n}“至高无上的神皇赋予了我洞察力。只要你简单地挥挥手，说几句充满智慧的话，我们就可以免除这痛苦的等待。”
languages.original_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

traits.locale_text: “而这是至高无上的神皇的意愿，亲爱的！”{n}婕伊举起双手，低下了头。{/n}“至高无上的神皇赋予了我洞察力。只要你简单地挥挥手，说几句充满智慧的话，我们就可以免除这痛苦的等待。”

languages.text: «¡Y esa era la voluntad del Exaltado, shereen!». {n}Jae levanta los brazos y agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Y el Exaltado me ha permitido ver cómo con un mero gesto de su mano y unas palabras sabias, podemos aliviar nuestra insoportable espera».
languages.original_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

traits.locale_text: «¡Y esa era la voluntad del Exaltado, shereen!». {n}Jae levanta los brazos y agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Y el Exaltado me ha permitido ver cómo con un mero gesto de su mano y unas palabras sabias, podemos aliviar nuestra insoportable espera».

languages.text: 「それにエグザルテッド・ワンの意思だったね、シェリーン！」{n}ジェイは両腕を上げてうなだれる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンはアタシに教えてくれてるよ、アンタが手を一振りして気の利いたことを役人どもに言ってくれれば、つらい待ち時間が楽になるってね」
languages.original_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

traits.locale_text: 「それにエグザルテッド・ワンの意思だったね、ダーリン！」{n}ジェイは両腕を上げてうなだれる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンはアタシに教えてくれてるよ、アンタが手を一振りして気の利いたことを役人どもに言ってくれれば、つらい待ち時間が楽になるってね」

languages.text: « Telle était la volonté de l'Exalté, shereen ! » {n}Jae lève les bras au ciel et baisse la tête.{/n} « Par chance, il m'a aussi montré comment faciliter cette épreuve de patience d'un simple geste de votre main assorti de quelques mots bien choisis. »
languages.original_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

traits.locale_text: « Telle était la volonté de l'Exalté, shereen ! » {n}Jae lève les bras au ciel et baisse la tête.{/n} « Par chance, il m'a aussi montré comment faciliter cette épreuve de patience d'un simple geste de votre main assorti de quelques mots bien choisis. »

languages.text: "Und das war der Wille des Erhabenen, Shereen!" {n}Jae streckt die Arme nach oben und senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Und der Erhabene hat mir die Einsicht gewährt, wie wir unsere mühselige Wartezeit mit einem simplen Winken Eurer Hand und einigen weisen Worten verkürzen können."
languages.original_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

traits.locale_text: "Und das war der Wille des Erhabenen, Shereen!" {n}Jae streckt die Arme nach oben und senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Und der Erhabene hat mir die Einsicht gewährt, wie wir unsere mühselige Wartezeit mit einem simplen Winken Eurer Hand und einigen weisen Worten verkürzen können."

languages.text: "Görkemli öyle istedi de ondan şirinim!" {n}Jae kollarını kaldırırken başını da eğiyor.{/n} "Elinin tek bir hareketi ve akıllıca seçilmiş birkaç lafla bu zorlu bekleyişi nasıl kolaylaştırabileceğimizi de Görkemli sayesinde biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "And that was the will of the Exalted One, shereen!" {n}Jae throws up her arms and lowers her head.{/n} "And the Exalted One has granted me insight as to how, with a simple wave of your hand and a few wise words, we can ease our arduous wait."

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli öyle istedi de ondan şirinim!" {n}Jae kollarını kaldırırken başını da eğiyor.{/n} "Elinin tek bir hareketi ve akıllıca seçilmiş birkaç lafla bu zorlu bekleyişi nasıl kolaylaştırabileceğimizi de Görkemli sayesinde biliyorum."
